meaningMnemonic: You're only <kanji>nearby</kanji> <vocabulary>while</vocabulary> you are nearby, that's it.
readingMnemonic:
Since this word consists of a kanji with hiragana attached, you can bet that it will use the kun'yomi reading.  You haven't learned this reading yet, so here's a mnemonic to help you:

<vocabulary>While</vocabulary> you live as a normal human citizen you also have another life as a <reading>cutter wa</reading>lrus (かたわ)! That's a walrus that cuts fish up while eating. It's your secret double life. You do it at night while you are a human by day!
